description: APPLICATION FOR ADVERTISEMENT CONSENT FOR THE DISPLAY OF 1 x NON-ILLUMINATED HOARDING SIGN AND 1 x NON-ILLUMINATED WALL SIGN
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The design and scale of the proposed advertisement on the building is not considered acceptable due to its impact on the character and appearance of the surrounding area, the locally listed building and the Conservation Area and; the proposal is considered to be contrary to Policy DM D5 and DM D4 of the Sites and Policies Plan 2014.

Reason : 2 - INFORMATIVE
Note to Applicant
In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton  (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:
"	Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
"	Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
"	As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.
In this instance:
"	The application was not considered to comply with the provisions of the Development Plan and NPPF as submitted, and would have required substantial changes such that a new application would be required. 
"	It is noted that the applicant/agent did not engage in any pre-application discussions.
"	The applicant is advised to seek pre-application advice on any resubmission.

Reason : 3 - INFORMATIVE
The following plans were considered with this applciation: TQRQM18338191219002, Nursery Front Elevation and Main Sign Plan, Front Elevation Dimension Plan, Side Eleavtion of Facade Sign, Compound Wall Elevation and Pole Sign Plan - View From Left, Compound Wall Elevation and Pole Sign Plan - View From Right, Compound Wall Elevation and Pole Sign Plan - Front View, Signs in Colour Plan and Site Plan Sign Locations
